post:
Hi, I'm a UK based PSD designer. I was told that I may find some work posting on here :). I have lots of experience designing web hosts, portfolios and wordpress themes - but I can pretty much design anything! So I'm currently looking to take on client work. You can see my previous work and also the recent stuff I've been working on at:

www.madebyjack.net
www.work.madebyjack.net
www.dribbble.com/inz

If you're interested in working with me then get in touch - I'm ready to start work straight away! I can accept Paypal, Moneybookers and UK bank transfer.

Contact details are available on my website :)
